non_residential_details.development_type: Change of Use with Extension(s) over 999sqm

description: Demolition of existing buildings (former Olive Factory) and redevelopment for mixed use comprising 93 units; 285sqm of office floor space, a private gym, parking and associated landscaping and access.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION:  The open market entrance area within the tower element at ground level shall incorporate side windows to provide surveillance on both flanks.

REASON: To ensure a safe and secure development.
